title: Dead Sexy
description: Mortuary attendant Gemma Sinclair hunts zombies for a living. It's messy work, but it pays the bills... right up until she stun guns the wrong dead man in the ass.Now to keep her family business going, Gemma's forced into a partnership with federal agent D.S. Thomas Conroy. Zombies are disappearing all over town, and he needs Gemma's help to figure out why. With a villain on her trail and a gang of zombies ready to attack, Gemma's just glad her backup is dead sexy...
author: Aleah Barley
